Package com.business

Interface CreditCardDummyService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreditCardDummyServiceImpl
public interface CreditCardDummyService
Author:
Mario Ruiz Rojo
Bussines layer abstraction to expose methods to the controller It offers operations to manage the credit card list

    it deletes one credit card that is already in the list
